 1: <?php
 2: /**
 3:  * Twitter Bootstrap common class.
 4:  *
 5:  * @author Vitex <vitex@hippy.cz>
 6:  */
 7: namespace Ease\TWB;
 8: 
 9: class Part extends \Ease\JQuery\Part
10: {
11:     /**
12:      * Vložení náležitostí pro twitter bootstrap.
13:      */
14:     public function __construct()
15:     {
16:         parent::__construct();
17:         self::twBootstrapize();
18:     }
19: 
20:     /**
21:      * Opatří objekt vším potřebným pro funkci bootstrapu.
22:      */
23:     public static function twBootstrapize()
24:     {
25:         parent::jQueryze();
26:         $webPage = \Ease\Shared::webPage();
27:         $webPage->includeJavaScript('twitter-bootstrap/js/bootstrap.js', 1, true);
28:         if (isset($webPage->mainStyle)) {
29:             $webPage->includeCss($webPage->mainStyle, true);
30:         }
31: 
32:         return true;
33:     }
34: 
35:     /**
36:      * Vrací ikonu.
37:      *
38:      * @link  http://getbootstrap.com/components/#glyphicons Přehled ikon
39:      *
40:      * @param string $code       Kód ikony z přehledu
41:      * @param array  $properties Vlastnosti Tagu
42:      */
43:     public static function glyphIcon($code, $properties = null)
44:     {
45:         if (is_null($properties)) {
46:             $properties = ['class' => 'glyphicon glyphicon-'.$code];
47:         } else {
48:             if (isset($properties['class'])) {
49:                 $properties['class'] = 'glyphicon glyphicon-'.$code.' '.$properties['class'];
50:             } else {
51:                 $properties['class'] = 'glyphicon glyphicon-'.$code;
52:             }
53:         }
54: 
55:         return new \Ease\Html\Span(null, $properties);
56:     }
57: }
58:
